titleStmt.title: A list of the names of all the adventurers in the stock of the honourable the East-India-Company, the 12th day of April, 1684 whereof those marked with a * are not capable (by their adventure) to be chosen committees.
titleStmt.author: East India Company.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication from Wing.
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
Wing reel guide incorrectly lists this item with reel 352.
